Control Name: 4.6.2 Data platform services are running in a highly available configuration/SKU.
Control Statement: Are data store(s) running in a HA configuration/SKU? i.e. SQL DB in a Zone Redundant configuration, or SQL MI Always-On.

control_attributes.Control_Clause: 4.6 What decisions have been taken to ensure the data platform meets your reliability requirements?
control_attributes.Control: 4.6.2 Data platform services are running in a highly available configuration/SKU.
control_attributes.Description: Are data store(s) running in a HA configuration/SKU? i.e. SQL DB in a Zone Redundant configuration, or SQL MI Always-On.
